channel.title: Windows Internals - Getting deep
channel.description:
Hi Friends,
In the last time, I'm trying to get deep in the windows Internals section. I found some stuff that maybe can help you also:
Windows Internals 6th (Part 1 & 2): http://materias.fi.uba.ar/7508/WI6/Windows%20Internals%20Part%201%20(6th%20Edition).pdf http://materias.fi.uba.ar/7508/WI6/Windows%20Internals%20Part%202_6th%20Edition.pdf
Sysinternals Forums: http://forum.sysinternals.com/forums.html
Reddit group: https://www.reddit.com/r/winternals/
Some online course in Pluralsight. Had someone did it? https://www.pluralsight.com/courses/windows-internals
If anyone has more material, I really would be happy if they share with us. ^_^

r/winternals

Some online course in Pluralsight. Had someone did it?

pluralsight.com

Windows Internals

This course helps you understand the basic concepts of Windows, its system architecture and the processes and threads.

If anyone has more material, I really would be happy if they share with us.
